articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: Two more coronavirus deaths in Northern Ireland
articles.description: Two further people with coronavirus have died in Northern Ireland, taking the region's death toll to 15.
articles.content:
Two further people with coronavirus have died in Northern Ireland, taking the region's death toll to 15.
There were 49 new positive cases of Covid-19 reported today, bringing the total number of confirmed cases in Northern Ireland to 324, according to the Pu… [+3761 chars]

articles.author: RTÉ Sport
articles.title: RUSADA temporarily halts testing due to coronavirus
articles.description: Russian anti-doping agency RUSADA said it was temporarily halting all testing in response to government measures aimed at curbing the spread of the coronavirus.
articles.content:
Russian anti-doping agency RUSADA said it was temporarily halting all testing in response to government measures aimed at curbing the spread of the coronavirus.
Russia has reported 1,036 cases of the virus and has stepped up measures to prevent it from sprea… [+1246 chars]
